about_the_game:
In RanchLife’s Multiplayer Mode, the focus is entirely on cooperative gameplay, with no PvP or competitive elements. You and your friends (or other players) work together to build and develop a single shared farm, creating a peaceful, collaborative farming experience. The emphasis is on teamwork, creativity, and enjoying the farm life together.

Features of the Cooperative Multiplayer Mode:

  • Shared Farm Building: You and your friends start on a shared farm and work hand in hand to expand and improve it. Whether it's planting crops, taking care of animals, or constructing new buildings, every task can be done as a team. You share resources and make collective decisions on how to grow your farm.

  • Task Specialization: Each player can focus on specific areas of the farm. One person might focus on crop production, another on animal husbandry, and a third on crafting processed goods like cheese or jam. This division of labor helps you progress faster and make the farm more efficient.

  • Resource Sharing: All resources earned on the farm are shared between the players. Whether it's crops, animals, or building materials, everyone has access to the collective pool of resources. This allows you to complete larger projects more quickly and support one another.

  • Collaborative Planning and Decision-Making: You and your team can discuss which buildings to construct next, what crops to plant, or which animals to raise. Every decision is made together, allowing you to customize the farm to your group’s vision.

  • Cooperative Town Development: Together, you’re not only working on your farm but also helping to develop the nearby town. You can take on quests from townspeople to unlock new buildings and features. Each completed task contributes to the town's growth, and you’ll share in the rewards as a team.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5-2500k (4 core 3.3 GHz) or AMD Ryzen 3 1200 (4 core 3.1 GHz)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 (4 GB) or AMD R9 290X (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX feature level 11_1 required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600k (4 core 3.5 GHz) or AMD Ryzen 5 2400 G (4 core 3.6 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6 GB) or AMD RX 570 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX feature level 11_1 required

short_description: In RanchLife, build your farm alone or with friends, raise animals, sell products, and help expand the town. Over time, you can open your own store and sell your goods directly.
